::KitKat::

Her link went off and it was Megatron."Commander, this is Kitkat.  I 
have Time Bomb and Land Mine, DrillBit and Terrorsaur.  SCorponok 
went to the other pred base to get DarkMouse's body back or 
something.  I'm sorry commander, but it's down to the six of us left."
It suddenly occured to her, the rats were jumping ship and so should 
she shortly if she wanted to survive. But how?  She shook her head. 
She had things to do here.  Here is where she belonged and here is 
where she would stay.  
\
She thought about Phobia. Maybe he could help he out.  She would have 
to wait for a bit, but she would go to his ship and talk to him. "I 
don't know how you can tell what I'm saying or know my thoughts 
Phobia.  But when it's dark out, I'll see you tonight."  She wallked 
off to the console and conducted her normal inspection.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     Megatron entered the cave and resumed his throne, cold and hard 
as it may 
> be. Currently, the majority of his troops were gone. Where could 
they be? He 
> was agrivated enough. Taking his commlink, "Predacons, sound off. 
Give your 
> current location and status." He demanded, a tone of anger in his 
deep, tact 
> voice.
> 
>     Black Aracnia rumaged in the store room until she found the box 
cotaining 
> the body parts of Tarantulas. It was actually marked, DO NOT OPEN 
UNDER ANY 
> CIRCUMSTANCES! SIGNED TRANSANULAS. That bastard had him here the 
whole time...
>     She dragged the bow out of the room, and was going to take it 
to the 
> engin room. Somehow, possibly a subconscience kick in the head by 
Tarantulas, 
> she knew she would find what she was looking for in there.
